official_title: A bill to provide loans and grants for fire sprinkler retrofitting in nursing facilities.
short_title: Nursing Home Fire Safety Act of 2007

summary.text: Nursing Home Fire Safety Act of 2007 - Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish programs of direct loans and grants for retrofitting nursing facilities with automatic fire sprinkler systems. Gives priority to grant applications that demonstrate a need or hardship.
